name: Magic: the Gathering Card Designer MTG
description:
Magic Card Designer

Design your own custom Magic: the Gathering Cards. Export cards as full vectors.


Supported features include:

  • Full Variants support. Only one configurable card! +split cards!
  • Creatures, Artifacts, Enchantments, Lands, Planeswalkers, Adventures, Sagas, Vehicles, Split, Aftermath, and Mystery Booster cards
  • Legendary border treatment
  • Mono, hybrid, 2 color gold, 3+ color gold all supported
  • 3-ability Planeswalker templates
  • Sagas with Auto Layout to configure saga triggers
  • Togglable holographic stamp
  • Swappable Set Symbols
  • Foil Overlay
  • Create Mystery Booster cards!
  • Stipulation cards for Cube drafts


Not yet supported:

  • Additional alternate Frames (e.g. Transform/double-faced cards)
  • Fuse split cards
  • Special frames (e.g. Etched foils, super art, box toppers)


Download and install Beleren:

The Beleren font is required to edit these cards. You can download it on Github.



-----------------

Change log

-----------------

November 3rd, 2020

  • Added hybrid support for all cards
  • Added both basic and aftermath split cards with full color support (gold, hybrid)
  • Split cards and normal full-frame cards were separated into two component sets. Access both from the "Card Components" page.


October 29th, 2020

  • Various performance improvements
  • Removed Rarity as a Property for Variants
  • Added all combinations of 2 color gold cards as values for the Color Property for Variants
  • You can change rarity by selecting the set symbol and changing the fill style from the Fill section of the right sidebar, or using Selection colors.


Supported properties and values:

  • Frame: Creature, noncreature, basic land, nonbasic land, planeswalker (3 ability), saga, vehicles, mutate
  • Color: White, Blue, Black, Red, Green, Gold, Artifact, Colorless, all two color gold/guild combinations
  • Legendary: Yes/No
  • Holo Stamp: Yes/No


October 28th, 2020

  • Added Variants to the card component. Dozens of cards are now just one.
  • Drag in the single Component Set "Card" and configure its properties directly in the Variants section of the right sidebar


Supported properties and values:

  • Frame: Creature, noncreature, basic land, nonbasic land, planeswalker (3 ability), saga, vehicles, mutate
  • Color: White, Blue, Black, Red, Green, Gold, Artifact, Colorless
  • Rarity: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Mythic
  • Legendary: Yes/No
  • Holo Stamp: Yes/No



April 2nd, 2020

  • Added Mutate frame support


February 10th, 2020

  • Added Auto Layout flavor text bar support


February 6th, 2020

  • Added an Auto Layout to Sagas!


January 3rd, 2020

  • Added Cube Draft Stipulation component with 24 examples


December 11th, 2019

  • Added the new Legendary Enchantment Creature frame as a toggleable option.


December 9th, 2019

  • Added rasterized textures to card backgrounds
  • Added another Toggle layer to add/remove the Starfield for Enchantment Creatures
